content.question: Which of the following best describes the authorâ€™s claim regarding price competition among products?

choices.label: Competition was mainly among products originating in European countries.
Competition was exclusively among foreign imports into Europe.
Competition was among products from a variety of sources within and outside of Europe.
Competition was primarily among goods produced in climates similar to that of Europe.

content.answer: Competition was among products from a variety of sources within and outside of Europe.

topic.text: 1.6: Technological Advances and the Age of Exploration

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
